participant_1.background:
I freeze up in social situations.
I work as a freelance accountant.
Sometimes i feel like i ve already been through life once before.
I was diagnosed with mild ocd in college.

participant_2.background:
I wish i could be more serious about school.
I have been in a lot of romantic relationships that have ended up poorly.
I get distracted easily.
I have lots of friends and can hold a conversation easily.
I am very athletic.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I'm a student, but I'm working on my degree part-time.
Oh, cool! What are you studying?
That's great! I'm a freelance accountant.
Oh, that's cool! Do you like it?
Yeah, I really enjoy it. It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm hoping to get a job in the business world when I graduate.
I'm sure you'll find something great! You seem like you're very smart and ambitious.
Thank you! I try my best.
What are some of your other interests?
I love to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I'm also a big fan of sports.
That's great! I love to go hiking and biking too. I'm not as big into sports, but I do enjoy watching them.
What are some of your favorite sports?
I love football, basketball, and baseball. I also enjoy watching hockey and soccer.
Those are all great sports! I'm a big fan of football and basketball too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm glad I met you!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
